transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: (Black screen with legend in lower left corner
Steven Wright
transcript.dialogue: (voiceover) My long lost father, finally you... (appears on-screen in guest monitor) you admit that you're my father.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (with Steven Wright hair) Yeah, well, good luck proving it.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost! I'm pickin' up four unidentified heat sources on my monitor screen.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, they're probably just creatures, Moltar. (pause) Space creatures.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: They just violated our air space.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Bring me my monocle. I want to look rich.

transcript.speaker: Steven Wright
transcript.dialogue: And that other father that they told me was my father, is he a stepfather or just a stranger posing...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (reading magazine) Uh, I don't know. Have you seen this? (shows Wright Magazine)

transcript.speaker: Steven Wright
transcript.dialogue: Wow.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah!

transcript.speaker: Steven Wright
transcript.dialogue: Do you like human women?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I like these twins.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Here's an update on those flying, dangerous space creatures...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Fill me in.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: They just entered the building through the loading dock.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Really?

transcript.speaker: Steven Wright
transcript.dialogue: Under these clothes I'm wearing, (a green pod is now in front of Space Ghost's desk) I'm wearing a ballerina outfit.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah. What's this pod doing here?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Replicating.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Replicating what?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Uhhh....us.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh no! Replicating pods! The kind that keep you up all night with their coughing!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No, the kind that copy your DNA, kill you off, and take over while you sleep!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: With their coughing.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Ugh...did you hear what I just sai-?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No one sleeps with my grandmother! Right?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Right. (off camera) From now on.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: This is for Nana! (Blasts one of the pods. The pod grows larger)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: It's feeding on the rays!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It's the rays! It's... it's feeding on them! (screams like a woman) What should I do?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Heh heh heh! Shoot it some more!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: But it seems to be feeding on the rays!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Then stop shootin' it!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Do what now? Oh! (stops shooting) Dang it! Well, it looks like they can't be killed. Uh, here Zorak, trade with me.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Heh heh heh! I don't think so. (evil laughing prompting Space Ghost to Blast the pod closest to Zorak) NO00000!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (blasting pod) Who's laughing now, Zorak? Who's laughing now?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey. Touch it. Go on! See what happens.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Touch it. You know you want to.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: C'mon, man. Touch it.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yes, feel its heat.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Touch it!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Stroke its supple contours.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Nothing'll happen. Just touch it. (whispers) It's what you wanna do. Touch it.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You know you want to. Touch it!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Touch it!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It's there for you to Touch.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You know you wanna.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: There, I touched it! Now I have to leave.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: No, you did not!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, I did! I touched It!

transcript.speaker: Steven Wright
transcript.dialogue: Who else is going to be on the show?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Your guts.

transcript.speaker: Steven Wright
transcript.dialogue: Oh.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (screams like a girl) The Blob! (Pod moves closer. Screams like a girl again as he flies back to the desk) Very scary monster! (Clears throat) I'm back!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Where'd you G-

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I said, where did you G-

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I SAID WHERE DID Y-

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (Yawn.) I am so sleepy.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (looking tired and yawning) Yeah...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (coughing) We should take turns sleeping. You go first.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You'll wake me up if the pod starts to replicate me, right?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Probably not.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Listen to me. We're not gonna live through this unless we all put aside our differences and band together as Friends.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You see, that's exactly what I'm talking about. (blasts Zorak)

transcript.speaker: Steven Wright
transcript.dialogue: I might need another coffee.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Good idea! We'll go get some coffee. You stay here, try to live. If anything bad happens...to you...well, we'll be getting coffee!

transcript.speaker: Steven Wright
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Father! You are my hero!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah. Thanks!

transcript.speaker: Steven Wright
transcript.dialogue: (staring at pod) Are, you're not human are you? (pod starts to open) Y..you should get that checked. Or I admire it. I don't know the reaction you want! I, I fear you! (pod moves closer) You're gonna kill me! (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: So, uh... (screaming from studio) Um, see I wor- (screaming from studio). This may... (short scream). This... (short scream). Nothin' (longer scream)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I have an idea.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (as if talking to a dog) There goes Space Ghost! Go get him! Go get Space Ghost! He's gettin' away! Ooh, Space Ghost's gettin' away! Bad Space Ghost! Go get Space Ghost now! He's gettin' away! Ooh da, bad Space Ghost! Look at him! Look at him, he's gettin' away with his cape flyin' and everything! Go get Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (Sigh.) They're not buyin' it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: They're not buying it because you messed it up!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: What? I was just trying to-

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I've got it! We'll get the Blob to kill the pods!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: How we gonna do that?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (at exit door) Hey, uh, Blob. You, uh, heard all the stuff the pods have been saying about your mother? (laughs) People are laughin', man. (pause) So, uh, you wanna come in here? And kill the pods? 'Cause of what they said? About your Mother?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm sorry. I, I had no idea. What's that, pods? The Blob is very fat?!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Didn't work, did it?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Of course it worked! But now I have a better plan. One that excludes the Blob's stupid mother. I'm going to order one of those mind-erasing kits.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Ya already have one!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I know.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Well?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Can't you see? If we erase our minds and forget how sleepy we are, we'll stay awake forever! (pause) So this is my idea. I'm thinking about ordering one of those mind-erasing kits.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Here's what we do. We order one of those mind-erasing kits.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You already HAVE ONE!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: If I already had one, don't you think I'd remember that?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: So go get it!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Get what?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: The kit!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What kit?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: All right, here's the plan. We create a diversion by throwing the planet's orbital axis off by 13 degrees. Actually, 10 degrees should do it. You don't want to throw it off too much because, well, you know. (Pause.) Now, once we've lowered the gravitational fields by, say, 40 gigawatts and secured the outer perimeter...securely...well I, I think we'll be just fine. (Picks up laser gun) Any questions? (cut to Space Ghost wearing monocle) Okay, then! Move out! Lock and load! Happy Birthday! And stay frosty! (cocks gun and fires off-camera)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm going to order one of those...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: All right, I've got a plan. We all know rust never sleeps, right? (Pause.) Right. So, if we all rust, we'll never sleep. Eh? Eh?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, you're the only one here made of metal. How are we gonna rust?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: So after you get metal-plated, that's when we all go to the beach. To rust.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Gee, that's a great plan, Moltar. But if we could get to the beach, we wouldn't have to be metal-plated.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: How many times do I have to tell ya? Because we'd be at the beach!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Mayday! Mayday! I'm Space Ghost and I am in some big danger! My plans were foolproof, (pod gets closer and falls over) but it started feeding on the rays! And then Moltar had a plan that never would have worked. (pod gets bigger and closer) I need a ship to rescue me. I'll be waiting for you out by the front gate. Thank you!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Nobody can hear ya, Space Ghost. We've been off the air for 10 days.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Excuse me. (invisos into control room, face-to-face with Moltar) Please don't tell me how to do it. It sickens me.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Mmmm, this is some good coffee! I thought we were out of coffee.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I found some more. It's in the orange container.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (does spittake into camera) You fool! (Collapses) That's decaf!

transcript.speaker: Colonial Man
transcript.dialogue: Oh, hello there! I didn't see you. I was busy reading my colonial book! I suppose you're wondering what happened to Space Ghost and his fabled gang. Well, I don't know! (evil laugh, cut to shot of Colonial Man as snarling vampire, then back to himself) But you can find out by checking eBay.com (text on screen: "Bid on the 'Space Ghost Ending' at www.ebay.com"), as they have a one-of-a-kind ending, that you can purchase starting at $7. Now leave me! For I must finish my colonial book! (growling sound effect as Colonial Man chuckles at book)

transcript.speaker: (Dramatic music as screen goes to black with white text
